summary: A collection of Python utilities that automate the generation and maintenance of project documentation. It wraps Sphinx commands for site building and debugging, converts contributor, data source, model parameter, publication, and resource information from structured files (YAML, spreadsheets, BibTeX, CSV/Excel) into reStructuredText, Markdown, or HTML fragments, and assembles them into documentation pages.
business_intent: To streamline the creation of accurate, consistently formatted documentation by programmatically transforming source data into the required markup and integrating it with the Sphinx documentation workflow, thereby reducing manual effort and supporting reliable documentation releases.
